lead_paragraph: BERTACCINI--Barbara Ann Levy, passed away peacefully on February 16 at the age of 90. Preceded in death by her husband of 62 years, Paul F. Bertaccini, she is survived by her children - Paul, Lisa, David and Donna, nine grandchildren and a great-granddaughter. From Buffalo, New York she raised her family in Freeport, Long Island where she taught English and Humanities to a generation of high school students. Upon retirement, she became a member of the board of trustees of the Freeport Memorial Library where she spent a decade leading adult education seminars that deepened her engagement with classical Greek literature, Chaucer and Shakespeare. An extraordinary teacher, storyteller, avid swimmer and world traveler, she loved animals, Jones Beach and all things Italian. Grief is too limited a word to describe the profound sense of loss for all family members. Donations can be made to: WCHOB Foundation, Women and Children's Hospital of Buffalo's Pediatric Cardiology Division. 1/3
